infos.title: About
infos.text:
A Heardle made React.

To create your own Heardle game, see here

about.title: Support
about.text: Have questions ? Run into bugs? DM Ipfil on Twitch or on Discord!

help.title: How to play
help.listen: Listen to the intro, then find the correct $t(heardleName) song in the list.
help.progress: Skipped or incorrect attempts unlock more of the intro.
help.win: Answer in as few tries as possible and share your score!
help.list: You can use the top right button to see the list of tracks.

game.help: Turn up the volume and tap to start the track!
game.toDaily: Click here to go to daily mode
game.toInfinite: Click here to go to infinite mode

search.placeholder: Know it? Search for the title / the game
search.noResult: No result found... You can use the button at the top right of the screen to see the list of all available tracks

player.error:
There was an error loading the player. Please reload and try again.
 You can contact the site administrator if the problem persists.

endPage.lose: You didn't get today's $t(heardleName) music. Better luck Tomorrow...
endPage.win_one: You got today's $t(heardleName) music within {{count}} second.
endPage.win_other: You got today's $t(heardleName) music within {{count}} seconds.

infinite.win_one: You got this $t(heardleName) music within {{count}} second.
infinite.win_other: You got this $t(heardleName) music within {{count}} seconds.

message.title: $t(heardleName) Heardle #{{dateId}}
message.win_one: You got today's $t(heardleName) music within {{count}} second.
message.win_other: You got today's $t(heardleName) music within {{count}} seconds.
